name: Black Ice Fracture
description:
Black Ice Fracture is a short Puzzle Game made for Ludum Dare  49 : Theme Unstable.

You play as a delivery driver for an Arctic research station.

You are tasked with delivering vital supplies to the base at each level. 

The supplies are scattered across the Ice in a variety of places, but due to regular traffic and changing temperatures, the ice is weaker in some spots than others. 

You must navigate this dangerous terrain to find the supplies, and bring all 3 crates back to the research station without falling into the water. 

Controls are WASD

Each ice block you cross will weaken it by one point with the weight of your vehicle but beware. The equipment will increase this weight to Two. If the ice breaks, even if you don't fall with it, you may not be able to make it back safely to the research station and will have to try again. 

(there is no reboot button, just fall into the water and the level will reboot. )
